reviews.review: its a good horror game

[h1]Осколок крови[/h1]
Всем привет. Разработчики сделайте пожалуйста, чтоб осколок крови было больше 1000, а то сейчас идет неделя паутины для маньяка. Мне они не нужны и качать их не собираюсь, получается играю в без накопления, 2я неделю коту под хвост. Не я один такой, это точно! Кто согласен, выведем в топ! Всем спасибо!

Помимо тех недочётов, что уже описали други игроки в своих обзорах на эту игру, её не хватает реалисточности. Вот только представьте, как будет круто смотреться мементо-мори на новом убийце "Кожаное лицо", если сюда добавят щепотку реалистичности: больше крови, брызги во все стороны, кишки и расчленёнка. Аж глаз будет радоваться. Того и гляди, стоимость игры поднимут на X рублей. А так, впрочем, играть можно, ведь постоянно выходят обновления для неё, а также DLC, за счёт которых приносятся новшевства в игру. 7/10

Very intense game that does a great job at supplying endless hours of fun. Running around trying to scare and kill your friends has never been more fun. The game certainly has had balancing issues between survivors and killers but the devs are actively updating and adjusting the game which is a good sign.

The community is pretty toxic and public games weren't that fun however Surviving with friends or playing a full game with friends is extremely fun. Worth the purchase if you have people to play with.

Идея игры  очень интересна. На данный момент онлайн есть неплохой, до 20тыс. Однако очень серьезные проблемы с серверами: выбрасывает во время подготовки лобби, не подключает игроков(перезапуск лобби помогает) и если начинается пинг, то он не прекратится до конца матча.
Почти хорошо, хотя есть ощущение что демо или хорошая заброшенная альфа. Нехватает разнообразия, прям... ну как демо.

Ich habe bissherr noch kein besseres Horrorspiel gespielt, als Dead by Daylight.
In diesem spiel erfährt man, was Angst haben und unter Spannung stehen wirklich bedeutet.
Die vielen Perks für die Killer und Überlebenden machen das Spiel noch interessanter und Aufregender, als es sowieso schon ist. 
Ich dachte am Anfang, dass ich dieses spiel nicht ewig weiterspielen kann, doch da lag ich Falsch, da man dieses Spiel ewig weiter spielen kann und es niemals an Lust verliert.

Nach einigen Spielstunden, muss ich mich einigen Vorrednern anschließnen. Das Spiel an sich hat Potezial, aber die Killer werden immer immer stärker. Das einer entkommt, ist fast unmöglich. Die Perks, die Geschwindigkeit usw sind viel zu stark bei den Killern. Der neue namens Leatherface übertrifft alles. Bei den Überlebenden, werden sie immer schwächer. Das Paletten nerven kenne ich, wenn ich mal den Killer spiele. Was anderes bleibt den Überlebenden nicht übrig, denn ein geübter Killer hat sie dann sicher. Auch die Bugs nerven, dass einfach Items verschwinden oder das ein Host mit einem Ping von über 200 als Killer spielt. An vielen Stellen bleibt man einfach hängen, weil dort Bäume zu nah bei einander stehen, obwohl man doppelt durch passt. Auch das frei wigglen, bringt einfach nichts, weil überall ein scheiß Hacken ist. Daher würde ich mir das Spiel nicht noch einmal kaufen, da der Spaß einem sehr sehr schnell vergeht.
Great game. A lot of balancing issues. Awful community.

Definitely recommend if you're looking for more of a time waster without a lot of dedication. Matches end usually within 10-15 minutes. Great fun with friends as well as solo. 

Only downsides are the community, it doesn't run very well, and the time it takes to find a game as a survivor can take a while at higher ranks unless you enjoy playing with 300 ping. 

If you're hesitant about buying, wait for a sale. It very commonly goes for $10 whenever it has the chance, and I find it to be a steal :) Hope this helps whoever reads this.

[h1]Dead By Daylight[/h1]
DBD is what I'd describe as an arcade horror experience taking place in a Forest with reality twisted by a malicious and malevolent being known only as the [b]"Entity"[/b]. You can play as 1 of 4 survivors within a team, tasked with escaping the map alive, or as a killer, each with a unique ability that assists in finding and killing the survivors.

As a survivor, every noise or bit of ambiance is taken as a potential threat, you may find yourself getting jumpy, while making your way to the generators to power the exit gates, and find your teamates to tackle objectives. The sight of the killer is enough to make most players panic, and make rash decisions. Such decisions normally getting teamates killed or injured.[spoiler]I'm talking to you, Meg mains.[/spoiler]

As a killer, you feel like an unstoppable force, patrolling the generators, looking for the survivors akin to a wolf hunting his quarry. The end goal being to sacrifice all the survivors to the entity, via the use of sacrificial hooks.

I'd definitely reccomend this game to people looking for a thrill.

Edit: As of the Legion patch, Dead by Daylight is now 100% non-functional for me.

Just play Civilization instead says Mathieu Côté, Dead by Daylight's Director.

Dead by Daylight tends to be the same cycle over and over. I figured I'd finally write it down so other would-be players comprehend how miserably unfun killer currently is to play.

Did you forget to dodge the Survive with Friends groups joining your lobby? Are you any killer but Billy or Nurse? Golly, it sure is nice of you to take those handicaps. Be ready for when the survivors suddenly quick-switch their items at the last moment too.

Let's begin; your hex totem(s) started near the survivors? Kiss your hex perk(s) goodbye. BNP(s) in game? If you don't patrol the gens in 20 seconds flat, prepare to suck it.

Survivor found! Do they have Sprint Burst? You can likely go back to hunting again.

Able to give chase? Prepare to savour the true killer experience as you run in circles with an occasional pallet drop ad nauseum until at least two or three generators are finished (this is apparently considered chasing by the devs although there's little risk for any survivor who knows what they're doing, especially if they're built for the task).

Broke off the chase? Better hope you find another in time to not lose the game.

Caught up enough to cause an injury? If they have Dead Hard to successfully crutch the next hit with, you'll spend even more time running in circles until you're ready to dry heave from whichever feeling you make it to first; your choices are boredom or frustration.

You have downed a survivor at last! If they're your Obsession, you'd better not forget to try dribbling them when you pick them up, or you will go straight back to square one. 

All that hard work has paid off, and you have a survivor in your arms. Did you check if anyone in the area has a flashlight? If not, be ready to go straight back to square one.

Now let's hope you make it to a hook before they wriggle free (which is faster with Decisive Strike even if they aren't your Obsession, then you're back at square one again).

At last, you've hooked a survivor! Congratulations on not nodding off during all the running in circles and making it through the gauntlet of survivor crutches (which would otherwise result in screwing you and making your effort turn out to be a giant waste of time).

Since you had the skill to get this far, you get to be bored all over again as a reward!

It's a given that any survivor team worth its salt is basically winning the game by the point you've managed this hooking, so your choices are either pitching a tent in the vicinity of those hard-fought gains or patrolling back and forth toward the nearest generators.

If the survivors know their business, they're likely to pop the exits while you desperately hope someone else will show up to finally make the game exciting (that's how killer works in Dead by Daylight: it promises a lot of fun and delivers precious little of it).

Assuming they aren't foolish enough to come get their friend en masse, prepare for the arrival of your newest crutch: Borrowed Time. If the survivors manage to make this next perk go off when they unhook their buddy, there's a good chance you are about to totally lose the game. If any exits are opened by the time they do, it's a given.

Be gracious when they chew you apart in the lobby for daring to camp and remember to smile: this is just how "surviving" works in the topsy-turvy world of Dead by Daylight! 

Surviving what? Maybe the game's developers will bother to answer that someday.

Ce jeu c'est de plus en plus n'importe quoi. Le jeu est clairement donné aux tueurs entre le camp et  le focus (d'après les devs c'est une technique) mais quand les survivant font tourner le tueur c'est compté comme de la "triche" ou du "troll".
Les compétences sont tcheater pour les tueurs entre le oneshot ou voir la position des survivants mais nous les seules compétences "tcheater" au'on a sont aussi tôt nerf et pas un petit nerf  mais un nerf qui fait en sorte que la compétence devienne inutile, par exemple coup décisif, saboteur, etc.. Le jeu ne vaut pas son prix non plus entre les bugs insane et la qualité reste médiocre.

離れたり戻ったりを繰り返してプレイはしていますが
運営の方針だろうと思いながらサバイバーがなんだかんだで優遇されてはいるけども
キラーもしっかりと立ち回りを理解しだしてからが楽しくなっていく役職ではあるので
初心者～中級者の方は最初にキラーをやって煽られたり全然吊れなかったりと
歯がゆい思いをしながらのプレイとなると思いますけど上手い人のプレイ動画や
このゲームはイヤホンやヘッドホンでやるだけでもサバイバーの足音や呼吸音が聞こえてくるので
ぜひ色んな人の動画を参考にしたり少し環境を変えてみるのはどうでしょうか！
通話非推奨と運営が言ってる割には大会ではプロチームが普通に連携してるので　はて？　って感じですが…ｗ
相手は常にチームを組んでいるものとしてキラーをやっていきましょう！
サバイバーはとりあえず変なことしなければ基本逃げれるので特に何もないです。

总是掉等级

追いかける楽しさも、逃げ惑う楽しさも味わえるゲームです。
１ゲームは１０～２０分程度で、一定の規則の中でランダム生成されるマップと、付けているパークで同じゲームは発生しないようになっているため、勝っても負けても何度でも遊びたくなるスルメゲー。
何時でも対戦相手が居て、気軽に１ゲーム出来るカジュアルさがまた良い感じ。
定期的にパッチが当てられてパークの強さや仕様が変わり、新キャラが追加されるとパークも追加されます。
DLCは追加キャラやスキンなので、ゲームを気に入ったら買えばいいと思うよ。

版権（Halloween, Leatherface, Nightmare, the Saw）以外のキャラとスキンはプレイ時間に応じて取得できます。
2018年度からは３か月のシーズン毎にキラーとサバイバーとマップを１つ追加していき、十年間は保守を続けるとも言っています。

80'li yıllarda "Teen Slasher" adıyla yeni bir film türü ortaya çıktı. Bir grup gencin, bir seri katil tarafından sırasıyla katledildiği bu türün popülerleşmesinde The Texas Chainsaw Massacre, Halloween, Friday the 13th ve A Nightmare on Elm Street gibi filmler öncü oldu. Klişe senaryo ve olay örgüsünün yer aldığı filmler zaman içerisinde sinema severler tarafından çok tutulunca, günümüzde oldukça gelişen oyun sektöründe bu türün de kendine bir yer edinmesi kaçınılmaz oldu. Dead by Daylight tüm bu klişeleri bir araya toplayıp, onları kendi tarzına göre yorumlayarak, bizlere gerilimi had safhada yaşatan, mükemmel bir gerilim oyunu olarak karşımıza çıktı.

Korku oyunlarında oyuncuları korkutmak için genellikle çok kullanılan "Jumpscare" tekniği artık oyun severler tarafından bayağı olarak nitelendiriliyor. Oyuncuların artık korku ve gerilim oyunlarından beklentileri de bu noktada farklı yöne kayıyor. Dead by Daylight ve Friday the 13th gibi kaçış temalı, çevrimiçi çok oyunculu korku oyunları artık oyun severlerin göz bebeği haline gelmeye başladılar. Gerilimin bir an bile kaybolmadığı, katilin nefesinin her an ensede hissedildiği Dead by Daylight aynı zamanda oyunculara katil rolünü de bahşederek tüm tabuları yıkmayı başarıyor ve  bize de şu sözü söylemek düşüyor "Artık kaçan biz olmayacağız".

İncelemenin devamı için; http://www.locusludus.com/oyun/68/dead-by-daylight/
作为一个忠诚的杀机玩家，这是我玩的第一个很尽兴的游戏，我感觉永远都玩不腻，希望杀机可以越做越久，越做越好！但是，这个游戏的BUG还需要改善，光是掉档我就掉了2次，至于官方回复从未着落，我希望官方能推出一个自动检测掉档情况，然后补偿的系统，谢谢！

This game was fun 5 years ago. But believe it or not, this is one of those games that requires an actual change to gameplay. Yes it has some great characters, and is certainly unique. However, this is artificial. Its practically become a monopoly of our favorite horror characters at this point, and it breaks my heart that I game I had so much fun with is now keeping these horror icons hostage in a game that hasn't changed in 5 years.

Believe me, it's fun! But I have roughly 1.8k hours and I have to say, it's gotten stale. The same perks I saw people using day 1 are still here after 5-6 years, and if doesn't sell you on the devs incompetence when it comes to balancing, I don't know what does.
